usa: Alaska was admitted to the Union, becoming the 49th state.<sup id="cite_ref-311" class="reference">[311]</sup>
The Day the Music Died: Musicians Buddy Holly, Ritchie Valens, J. P. "The Big Bopper" Richardson, and pilot, Roger Peterson, were killed in a plane accident.[312]
The First Grammy Awards was held.<sup id="cite_ref-313" class="reference">[313]</sup>

U.S. Army Master Sergeant Chester Ovnand and Major Dale M. Buis were killed in South Vietnam, being the first two official American casualties of the Vietnam War.<sup id="cite_ref-314" class="reference">[314]</sup><sup id="cite_ref-315" class="reference">[315]</sup>
Hawaii was admitted to the Union, becoming the 50th state.<sup id="cite_ref-316" class="reference">[316]</sup>
